original: “Bhante nāgasena, navime puggalā mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivaranti na dhārenti.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena nava ime puggalāḥ mantitam guyham na dhārenti

original: Rāgacarito dosacarito mohacarito bhīruko āmisagaruko itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako dārako”ti.
analyzed: rāga caritaḥ dosa caritaḥ moha caritaḥ bhīrukaḥ āmisa garukaḥ itthī paṇḍakaḥ dārakaḥ iti

original: “Rāgacarito, bhante nāgasena, rāgavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, dosacarito,
analyzed: rāga caritaḥ bhante nāgasena rāga vasena mantitam na dosa caritaḥ

original: bhante, dosavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, mūḷho mohavasena mantitaṁ
analyzed: bhante dosa vasena mantitam guyham na dhārā iti mūḷhaḥ moha vasena mantita

original: guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, bhīruko bhayavasena mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti,
analyzed: guyham vivarati na dhārā iti bhīrukaḥ bhaya vasena mantitam guyham vivarati na dhārā iti

original: āmisagaruko āmisahetu mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, itthī paññāya ittaratāya
analyzed: āmisagarukaḥ āmisa hetu mantitam guyham vivarati na itthī paññāya ittaratāya

original: mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, soṇḍiko surālolatāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati
analyzed: mantitam guyham vivarati na dhārā iti soṇḍikaḥ surā lolatāya mantitam guyham vivarati

original: na dhāreti, paṇḍako anekaṁsikatāya mantitaṁ guyhaṁ vivarati na dhāreti, dārako capalatāya
analyzed: na dhārā iti paṇḍakaḥ aneka sikatāya mantitam guyham na dhārā iti dārakaḥ capalatāya
mantitam guyham vivarati na dhārā iti
